author: bmwlego
title: The Dark Knight Watches Over My Keys
review: I got this from my brother in law and love it! Batman is my favorite DC Superhero and I love LEGO so this was an awesome gift. I have the black suit Batman as well and this looks just as good. The LEGO plate is a great touch, too bad they didn't add another plate with the Batman logo! His suit is quite detailed and the fig is a great LEGO-ization of Batsy. As the great Jack Nicholson said in 1989's "Batman" movie..."Those toys! Where does he get those wonderful toys?" Why, at the LEGO Store of course!
